artist: Artist: Erich Heckel (recto); Artist: August Gaul (verso); Publisher: Galerie Paul Cassirer; Printer: M.W. Lassaly
creditline: Gift of Robert Bulger in honor of Elizabeth and Madelyn Brunner
description: page with prints on two sides--seated man and standing figure on small farm plots with buildings in background and text at top on recto; text and flowers, butterflies, and mushrooms on verso
title: Belgian Landscape (Belgische Landschaft) (recto) and The Meadow (Die Wiese) (verso), page from "Der Bildermann", folio 16, vol. 1, no. 8
